The aim study diagnose early coronary artery disease NAFLD patient measure PLA2 . Methods : 60 patient chest pain low intermediate risk coronary event undergo Cardiac CT blood test measurement enzyme PLA2 , marker inflammation : CRP , MDA ( Malondialdehide ) , Paraoxonase , FFA ( Free Fatty Acids ) , TG ( Triglycerids ) perform . CAD define stenosis 50 % least one major coronary artery , unstable plaque define low attenuate plaque < 30HU fatty liver define difference liver spleen attenuation value -10HU use CT. Expected result : expect PLA2 high patient patient combination CAD , unstable plaque NAFLD .
